text: "List index out of range" error in Python
I am making a simple Checkers again.
And, in order to keep track of all the locations for the checkers to move to, I created a list to add all of the locations.

However, when I try to execute the program, I always get:
Ld8 = Locations[31] - list index out of range
So, I thought maybe a list can only contain certain amount of numbers.
So, I created a second Locations list and added rows E - H, so to split up the list.
But, I still receive the same error of index being out of range.
(Ld8 is the variable storing the location for Row D, Column 8)
